actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for bicycle facilities in public buildings, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Bicycle and Physical Fitness Facilities Act

summary.text: Federal Bicycle and Physical Fitness Facilities Act - Requires the Administrator of the General Services Administration to provide safe bicycle parking facilities at all buildings under control of the Administrator within one year after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Federal Bicycle and Physical Fitness Facilities Act
A bill to provide for bicycle facilities in public buildings, and for other purposes.
